wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Higgins, known as "Sandy Higgins" (7 November 1863 – 17 April 1920) was a Scottish footballer who played for Kilmarnock, Derby County, Nottingham Forest and the Scotland national team.

response: * 17 April – Alex Higgins, Scottish international footballer (born 1863)
* 7 November – Alex Higgins (d. 1920), Scotland international in one match, scoring three goals (1885).
